title: The Best of the PAC12  and a Visit from a 4 time Super Bowl Champion
description:
Wendi Nix, Eddie Royal and Stanford Steve discuss if Clemson is officially back and who has the best chance to win ACC Coastal. Then, Pete Thamel joins the show to tell us which Big12 quarterback will return to the field after missing the past month due to an injury and which SEC quarterback is questionable for Saturday. Also, who's leading the PAC 12 and how does Utah plan to put a stop to UCLA's undefeated season? Plus, four time Super Bowl Champion and three time Super Bowl MVP, Joe Montana, stops by to give his thoughts on Notre Dame this season and remembers the 1979 Cotton Bowl.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew looks into UCLA's big matchup this weekend and Joe Montana joins the show
